#labels Featured
Please use this page for any feature requests. Simply use the comment feature at the end of the page to post your feature request, or to discuss the other feature requests. _Note: _your comment may be deleted after your feature is added to the list to keep this page manageable. Please do not be offended.

*BUG REPORTS* - Bugs should be [http://code.google.com/p/sequel-pro/issues/entry added] to the [http://code.google.com/p/sequel-pro/issues/list issue tracker]. Please review the [http://code.google.com/p/sequel-pro/issues/list list] to ensure your bug hasn't already been reported.
